link.title: Southern Fulton Jr/Sr High School - News
Southern Fulton Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Southern Fulton has created a Continuity of Education plan that provides information as to how students are to be educated while our schools are shutdown. Click here to view the plan.
Visit our District News page for Superintendent's Letter to Families

span.style: text-align: left; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: "Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; display: inline !important; white-space: normal; orphans: 2; float: none; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px;

span.span: Governor Wolf has announced that all schools are now closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year due to growing concerns statewide about the spread of the Coronavirus (COVID-19).

span.p: If you need assistance finding food, paying housing bills, accessing free childcare, or other essential services, please click on the link below.
